brownfield.legacySnippet:
// BOUNDARY_VIOLATION
// File: app/actions/admin.ts:3
// Prisma client usage detected outside repository/db boundary.
brownfield.rebuiltSnippet:
// v4.0 Vertical Slice Pattern
// API-ID: API-001
import { svc } from './svc';

// LLID: L-001-create
await repo.create(data);

findings.message: Prisma client usage detected outside repository/db boundary.
findings.fix: Move Prisma usage into a repository layer (/repositories/ or /db/) and expose via DB-ID wired contract.
